item.title: Experimenting with EU governance in the Telecoms sector
item.description: Marta Cantero (Postdoctoral Researcher, University of Helsinki | FiDiPro Project) Creating a unified digital market for telecommunications within Europe is a primary goal of the current European Commission. [i] However, achieving this single market remains a distant prospect. The current multi-tiered regulatory model for European telecommunications relies heavily on individual nations’ regulatory bodies to implement the EU’s telecom framework. Furthermore, enforcing this framework falls upon the Member States themselves under their own national procedures.
